about_the_game:
Visual novel meets management sim. After your master's spell goes awry, you, a lowly goblin, suddenly find yourself in a position of power. Thanks to the magical mishap, you have become the ruling lord of the realm! You’ll need to govern your lands, renovate your manor, and most importantly- train up your naïve maids into a team of skilled servants!

Real lords make the tough decisions.

Someone’s got to take charge, so why not a goblin? Many people doubt you, but Greenwood needs a strong ruler who knows how to protect them, just like maids (and Az’ea) sometimes need guidance and discipline.

  • BEAUTIFUL ARTWORK: lovingly crafted erotic illustrations and animations!

  • TIME MANAGEMENT: you are in charge scheduling your servants tasks!

  • GRAND STORY: from rags to riches, enjoy- and defend- your newfound fortune!

  • PARTIAL VOICE ACTING: talented voice performances bring the characters to life!

content_descriptors.notes: This game is dark fantasy and contains depictions of sexual interactions, mainly between humans and a goblin. This includes: cuckoldry, bondage/discipline themes, and dubiously consensual sex via hypnotism/magic.
